verses.verse: By the rivers <S%H5104><s%> of Babylon, <S%H894><s%> There <S%H8033><s%> we sat <S%H3427><s%> down <S%H3427><s%> and wept, <S%H1058><s%> When we remembered <S%H2142><s%> Zion. <S%H6726><s%>
Upon the willows <S%H6155><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of it We hung <S%H8518><s%> our harps. <S%H3658><s%>

For there <S%H8033><s%> our captors <S%H7617><s%> demanded <S%H7592><s%> of us songs, <S%H1697><s%> <S%H7892><s%> And our tormentors <S%H8437><s%> mirth, <S%H8057><s%> [saying], "Sing <S%H7891><s%> us one of the songs <S%H7892><s%> of Zion. <S%H6726><s%>"
How <S%H349><s%> can we sing <S%H7891><s%> the Lord's song <S%H7892><s%> In a foreign <S%H5236><s%> land <S%H127><s%>?
If <S%H518><s%> I forget <S%H7911><s%> you, O Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> May my right <S%H3225><s%> hand <S%H3225><s%> forget <S%H7911><s%> [her skill.]

May my tongue <S%H3956><s%> cleave <S%H1692><s%> to the roof <S%H2441><s%> of my mouth, <S%H2441><s%> If <S%H518><s%> I do not remember <S%H2142><s%> you, If <S%H518><s%> I do not exalt <S%H5927><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> Above <S%H5921><s%> my chief <S%H7218><s%> joy. <S%H8057><s%>

Remember, <S%H2142><s%> O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> against the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Edom <S%H9000><s%> The day <S%H3117><s%> of Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> Who said, <S%H559><s%> "Raze <S%H6168><s%> it, raze <S%H6168><s%> it, To its very foundation. <S%H3247><s%>"

O daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Babylon, <S%H894><s%> you devastated <S%H7703><s%> one, How blessed <S%H835><s%> will be the one who <S%H7945><s%> repays <S%H9608><s%> you With the recompense <S%H1576><s%> with which <S%H7945><s%> you have repaid <S%H1580><s%> us.
How blessed <S%H835><s%> will be the one who <S%H7945><s%> seizes <S%H270><s%> and dashes <S%H5310><s%> your little <S%H5768><s%> ones <S%H5768><s%> Against <S%H413><s%> the rock. <S%H5553><s%>
